entry.title: gautamgiri-dev/use-status-manager: A lightweight and flexible custom React hook for managing subscriptions and status updates in your application. It helps you subscribe to a list of candidates, fetch their statuses, and keep them updated with polling and debounce functionality.

entry.title: nianyi778/unplugin-version-injector: unplugin-version-injector is a powerful and lightweight plugin that automatically injects the version number and build timestamp into all HTML files. It supports Webpack 4/5, Vite, and Rollup, making it ideal for both Single Page Applications (SPA) and Multi-Page Applications (MPA).
entry.content: unplugin-version-injector is a powerful and lightweight plugin that automatically injects the version number and build timestamp into all HTML files. It supports Webpack 4/5, Vite, and Rollup, making it ideal for both Single Page Applications (SPA) and Multi-Page Applications (MPA).

entry.title: Bhargavxyz738/Lazy-CSS: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
entry.content: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
